Interface IProjectService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectService
public interface IProjectService
Interface for services related to managing and retrieving project data. Provides methods for CRUD operations on projects and applying filters to project lists.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addProject(Project project)
    Adds a new project to the system.
    List<Project>
    applyFilters(List<Project> projects, FilterSettings filterSettings)
    Applies filter settings to a list of projects.
    void
    deleteProject(Project project)
    Deletes a project from the system.
    List<Project>
    findAllProjects()
    Retrieves all projects in the system.
    List<Project>
    findByManager(String managerName)
    Finds all projects managed by a specific manager.
    Project
    findProjectByName(String name)
    Finds a project by its name.

  • Method Details

    • findProjectByName

      Project findProjectByName(String name)
      Finds a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the project
      Returns:
      the Project with the specified name, or null if not found

    • findAllProjects

      List<Project> findAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all Project objects

    • addProject

      void addProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project to the system.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project object to be added

    • deleteProject

      void deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes a project from the system.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project object to be deleted

    • findByManager

      List<Project> findByManager(String managerName)
      Finds all projects managed by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      managerName - the name of the manager
      Returns:
      a list of Project objects managed by the specified manager

    • applyFilters

      List<Project> applyFilters(List<Project> projects, FilterSettings filterSettings)
      Applies filter settings to a list of projects.
      Parameters:
      projects - the list of projects to filter
      filterSettings - the filtering criteria
      Returns:
      a list of projects that match the filter criteria
